has: strongly supervised AM + NG + NL Memory Networks approach

has.from sentence: MemNN : The strongly supervised AM + NG + NL Memory Networks approach , proposed in .

weakly supervised heuristic version.from sentence:
MemNN- WSH :
A weakly supervised heuristic version of MemNN where the supporting sentence labels are not used in training .

standard LSTM model.from sentence: LSTM : A standard LSTM model , trained using question / answer pairs only ( i.e. also weakly supervised ) .
